description:
Learn a new language with the world’s most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 40+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills.

Designed by language experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

And now, you can learn Math and Music the Duolingo way!  

Build real-world math skills – from calculating tips to identifying patterns – and sharpen your mental math in our Math course.

Learn how to read music and play familiar songs on your device in our Music course – no instrument required.

Whether you’re learning for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you’ll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?
• Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters keep you motivated to build solid skills across language, math and music.

• Duolingo works. Designed by learning experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term knowledge retention.

• Track your progress. Work toward your learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

• Join 300+ million learners. Stay motivated with competitive Leaderboards as you learn alongside our global community.

• Every course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian. And now, learn Math and Music with our newest courses!

What the world is saying about Duolingo:

“Far and away the best language-learning app.” –The Wall Street Journal

“This free app and website is among the most effective language-learning methods I’ve tried… lessons come in the form of brief challenges – speaking, translating, answering multiple-choice questions – that keep me coming back for more.” –The New York Times

“Duolingo may hold the secret to the future of education.” – TIME Magazine

“…Duolingo is cheerful, lighthearted and fun…” - Forbes

“Our favorite language app…” - CNET

If you like Duolingo, try Super Duolingo for 14 days free! Learn a language fast with no ads, and get fun perks like Unlimited Hearts and Monthly Streak Repair.

If you choose to purchase Super Duolingo, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://www.duolingo.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.duolingo.com/terms

Knowunity with SchoolGPT – the UK’s most popular learning app for students from Year 5 to A-Levels – is COMPLETELY FREE! Over 22 million students across Europe use Knowunity to boost their grades – that’s every other student in the UK! 

► Better grades thanks to Knowunity: 94% of our users say so.
► “You get everything you need for school here, and the AI features are incredible. You won’t want to use any other AI app!”
► “I learn better, faster, and more easily. Thank you for creating this life-saving school app!”

WHY CHOOSE KNOWUNITY (SCHOOLGPT)? THE BEST AI FOR STUDENTS
> AI that truly understands school life
> Tailored explanations for every year group, right in the chat
> AI scanner, available 24/7, with the best answers
> Quizzes, revision notes, mock exams, or visual explanations – all created for you in the AI chat
> 100% personalised and completely free

FREE REVISION MATERIALS
> Access millions of revision notes and learning resources from other students
> Flashcards, summaries, mock exams, practice tests and much more
> Get a better understanding of every topic
> Discover a wide range of content for each subject in your search results

STUDY YOUR WAY
> Flashcards for all topics
> Create automatic quizzes and flashcards
> Listen to all content
> Mock exams for every subject

SCHOOL PLANNER
> Your library: all your study materials in one app
> Download content for offline use

HOMEWORK HELP
> Scan maths questions
> Essay writing support

STUDENT COMMUNITY
> A community of students
> Student chats for every topic
> Exchange ideas and stay motivated together
> Create study groups and build your own learning community!

SHARE YOUR KNOWLEDGE
> Create your profile
> Share your content and inspire others
> Help students learn and understand – become a creator

AI FEATURES FOR SCHOOL
> AI Scanner
> AI Helper
> AI Chat
> AI Tutor
> Knowunity SchoolGPT is perfect for ALL STUDENTS, ALL YEAR GROUPS, and ALL SUBJECTS. It’s fun and completely free.

SCHOOL. MADE SIMPLE.
Knowunity is designed with students’ needs in mind, so you’ll find everything you need for school in one app. Discover only relevant content, learn with friends, and find motivation and inspiration. The tutor and student community are always there for you, so you’ll never have to study alone again.
Find high-quality revision materials created by students, covering every part of the curriculum – with no gaps!

We’re real people, and we value your feedback. If you have questions or suggestions, please contact us at 
support-uk@knowunity.com
.
For more information, visit 
WWW.KNOWUNITY.CO.UK

Terms & Conditions: 
https://knowunity.co.uk/terms

Welcome to a new era of AI-enhanced studying with Quizlet. Immerse yourself in any subject imaginable, where you can choose from over 700 million digital flashcard sets or create your own. As the number 1 AI-enhanced learning platform, Quizlet offers personalised quizzes and practice tests, expert-written homework solutions and transformative AI study tools. Join a community of over 300 million learners who have improved their results and achieved their goals with Quizlet.

With the Quizlet app, students and teachers can:
Upload class notes to make flashcards, practice tests and essay prompts with Magic Notes
Create flashcard sets or search from millions of flashcards created by other students and teachers
Turn flashcards into formative assessments or interactive flashcard games
Use Learn and Test modes to transform flashcards into quizzes and practice tests 
Retain material in the long term with spaced repetition
Crush tough homework problems with expert-written solutions 

Download the app today and join a community of over 300 million learners worldwide. 
Upgrade to Quizlet Plus and get complete access to homework help, personalised study modes and ad-free studying.

What our students say when they leave 5-star reviews:

“Best study app ever!!”
“The only app I use when I need to study seriously.”
“Quizlet is by far the best studying app I’ve downloaded. It’s packed full of different ways to study for upcoming tests!”

Quizlet Plus subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account.

Your monthly or annual subscription will be renewed automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in your Account Settings after purchase. 

Terms of service: https://quizlet.com/tos
Privacy policy: https://quizlet.com/privacy

Join over 600,000 students improving their grades with the leading AI tutor for one-on-one support in math, physics, chemistry, and more. Astra AI gives you instant, step-by-step help tailored to your level. Always available, adapts to your pace, and never loses patience.

Ace your next test with “Exam Prep” feature, get instant homework help with “Solver Mode” or dive deeper into any subject with “Socratic Mode”. Astra AI is your go-to study app, built to put your learning in turbo mode. Learn faster and smarter than ever.

Practice algebra, geometry, linear equations, chemical reactions, the periodic table, forces, kinematics and more to build the foundation for your future.

Key Features
Snap and solve
Take a photo of a math problem, upload it, and get a step-by-step explanation instantly.

Step-by-step problem solving
The app adapts to your progress, identifies gaps, and recommends what to learn next.

Exam prep
Take a photo of your exam or choose topics, and Astra creates a personalized study plan.

Curriculum-based learning
Astra AI adapts lessons to your country’s official school program, so you learn exactly what’s taught in class.

Covers 12 subjects: 
Math, Physics, Chemistry, English, German, Biology, Informatics, Geography, History, Economics, Psychology, Philosophy and more. 


Available 24/7
No appointments, no waiting - ask anything, anytime

Why use Astra AI?
You’ll finally understand topics that felt impossible. You’ll stop wasting time guessing what to study. And most of all, you’ll feel more confident going into class, exams, and the rest of your school year. With this learning app, it’s like having a private tutor in your pocket. 

Trusted by 600,000+ users
From students to teachers, Astra AI is already helping hundreds of thousands unlock a better way of learning. It’s used daily in classrooms, at home, and during high-stakes final exam prep. Many students say they feel more confident learning at their own pace and no longer feel ashamed to ask the same question repeatedly until they understand it.

Download Astra AI now and ace your next test.
Get homework help or prepare for your next exam in Math, Physics, or Chemistry — or choose a custom subject.

Studying shouldn’t feel overwhelming. It shouldn’t take hours either.

And if you care about learning faster with less stress, you’re in the right place.

Snitchnotes is your AI-powered study companion that helps you prep for exams and finally make sense of your lectures. It creates detailed notes from your recordings, PDFs, and slides — almost instantly.

1. Record and transcribe lectures automatically
Stop scrambling to write everything down. Just record, and Snitchnotes converts your audio into structured notes with clear explanations, summaries, and key ideas - so you can stay focused while learning.

2. Upload PDFs, slides, or screenshots
Drop in any material - textbooks, research papers, even messy lecture slides - and get clean summaries written in a way that actually helps you understand the topic, not just memorize it.

3. Learn faster with active recall
Active recall is proven to double retention - Snitchnotes builds it into your flow effortlessly.

4. Stay organized without trying
All your notes, flashcards, and lecture recordings live in one clean workspace. Nothing scattered, nothing lost. Just open Snitchnotes and pick up exactly where you left off.

5. Save hours every week
Snitchnotes handles the busywork - summarizing, formatting, organizing - so you can focus on learning. Most students report cutting their study time in half while retaining more information.

6. Study in your language
Supports over 100 languages - from English, Spanish, and German to Japanese and Polish - so you can study comfortably, wherever you are.

Get your first note generated for FREE as a free user
You can upgrade to Snitchnotes Premium to have access to all features which include:
- unlimited notes
- faster note generations
- access to quizzes (coming soon)
- chat with your notes (coming soon)
- and much more

Whether you’re preparing for exams, catching up on lectures, or revising on the go - Snitchnotes gives you the clarity, structure, and focus that make studying actually enjoyable again.

Thousands of students use it to learn faster, save time, and finally feel confident before exams.

Stop rewriting your notes. Start understanding them.

Download Snitchnotes and study smarter today!

Privacy Policy: https://snitchnotes.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://snitchnotes.com/terms
License Agreement (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Hi, and welcome to Toca Boca World! It’s the ultimate universe for kids to play, design, and explore their endless imaginations. This isn't just a game, it's a safe space where every story is yours to create, and the fun never stops.

Toca Boca World is where creativity takes centre stage:
• Unleash your inner storyteller: Roleplay in a universe you've created, where you can tell your own stories. Become a teacher, a vet, or even an influencer.
• Design your dream world: Bring your best friends to life with Character Creator. Customise hair, faces, and accessories to make up your own style! Use the intuitive Home Designer tool, and you're the architect! Decorate your own house, supermarket, campervan, or any of our constantly updated locations with the furniture and colours you love.
• Explore and discover a game of secrets and surprises: Find hundreds of hidden gems in the game! From jewels and crumpets to unlocking secret rooms, there’s always something new and exciting to uncover.
• Fresh content, always: Toca Boca World is an endless universe that keeps growing! Discover new locations and content updated every month, there's always more to explore.
• Friday is gift day! Pop into the Post Office to collect the gifts we’ve sent you on the conveyor belt, including decorations, furniture, and even pets! Keep an eye out for Gift Bonanzas where we give away a LOT of items from previous years.

More than 60 million girls and boys play on Toca Boca World, the very first game of its kind – that's a LOT of kid-testers making sure the fun never ends!
• Press play! Download Toca Boca World now and dive into an endlessly fun universe. Furnish your first apartment in Bop City, buy housewarming items for your Free Family House and don’t forget to get your hair done before the party with characters you’ve created!
• Expand your world: You can build a bigger Toca Boca World with all the stuff available in the in-app shop! Play your best influencer life in the Megastar Mansion, take care of animals in the pet hospital, or just relax in Bubble Bop Spa with your friends!
• A safe and secure play environment: At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play above all else. Toca Boca World is a single-player kids’ game, COPPA compliant, and designed as a secure platform where you can explore, create, and play freely without interruptions. That’s our promise to you!
• Award-winning fun: Recognised as App of the Year 2021 and an Editor's Choice, Toca Boca World is praised for its quality and dedication to kids’ safety, and continues to evolve to be better and better!
• No ads, ever: Toca Boca World will never show third-party ads. We’ll never interrupt your game with adverts. Play always comes first!
• About us: Our fun, award-winning kids’ game can be downloaded on phones, tablets and computers for free. We also offer in-app purchases for our most dedicated fans, which allows us to build a game with a focus on quality that is completely ad-free and 100% safe. We take privacy very seriously, learn more at https://tocaboca.com/privacy.

• Stay connected! Discover our latest updates and collaborations by following us on social media:
https://www.instagram.com/tocaboca/
https://www.youtube.com/@tocaboca
https://www.tiktok.com/@tocaboca?lang=en-GB

Ready to Speak English Confidently? 

Welcome to Learna AI English Tutor App, your all-in-one solution for mastering the English language! Learn English with grammar, speaking, reading, pronunciation, and vocabulary practices designed to enhance your proficiency in every aspect of the language.

With Learna AI, you can speak English confidently and effectively through interactive conversations. Our app takes your language learning journey beyond traditional methods. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Learna AI is here to help you learn & speak English in a fun, engaging, and personalized way.

English practices and lessons are guided by our Learna AI Virtual Chat Character, offering tailored support as you learn. You can speak with the AI character to improve both your speaking and listening skills. The app provides real-time feedback, helping you speak correctly and refine your vocabulary as you go. This makes learning English more dynamic, interactive, and efficient, as you can practice speaking at your own pace.

Learna AI also focuses on improving your grammar skills. You’ll learn essential grammar rules and practice them through a variety of exercises that help reinforce your understanding. The grammar practices are designed to gradually improve your proficiency, allowing you to speak with accuracy and clarity. As you learn grammar, you will build a stronger foundation for your speaking and writing skills.

Vocabulary plays a critical role in speaking English fluently. With Learna AI, you can improve your vocabulary by learning new words and phrases that are practical and useful in daily conversations. Each lesson focuses on building your vocabulary, ensuring you have a broad range of words at your disposal. The app features vocabulary practice that adapts to your level, helping you speak more naturally and confidently.

Your pronunciation also gets a boost with Learna AI. As you speak, you’ll receive valuable feedback to improve your pronunciation. The app includes exercises specifically designed to help you master English pronunciation and speak clearly. Pronunciation practices allow you to correct mistakes and sound more authentic when speaking English.

Track your progress with detailed performance metrics and milestones. Set learning goals to monitor your achievements and celebrate your successes. With continuous practice, you’ll see your speaking skills improve, and your vocabulary will expand. By setting specific goals, you ensure that each practice session is focused and effective.

Learna AI Language Tutor Features:

English Conversation Practice with Learna AI Virtual Chat Character
Get feedback from Learna AI for your mistakes
Learn English Grammar with tailored lessons
Improve your English Reading Skills
Enrich your English Vocabulary with daily vocabulary practices & Learn new words 
Spelling Check and vocabulary reinforcement
Perfect your English Pronunciation through interactive exercises
Enhance your English Speaking Skills through practical speaking practice
Track your progress and set goals to continually improve
Speak, practice, and learn today with Learna AI, your partner in mastering the English language!
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Photomath is known worldwide for helping millions of learners to learn, practice, and understand maths – one step at a time. 

Scan any maths problem with the Photomath app to get step-by-step explanations with accurate solutions and a variety of teacher-approved methods. Maths is about the process, so Photomath breaks your problem into bite-sized steps to help you understand the “what” and “why” along with the “how.” Whether you’re learning basic arithmetic or advanced geometry, we’ll tackle it together, step by step. 

Why Photomath? 

Billions of maths problems: From primary school maths to advanced calculus and everything in between, Photomath can solve billions of maths problems—including word problems! Whether handwritten, in a textbook, or on a screen, Photomath is here to help you untangle your trickiest problem.

Step-by-step explanations: Maths isn’t just about an answer. It’s about every step along the way. That’s why Photomath breaks down each step, so you can *really* learn. Less guesswork = less stress, especially with our new Animated Steps, which show you the exact progression of a particular step. 

Expert-developed methods: Photomath’s educational content is centered around the learner’s experience, driven by the expertise of our own team of mathematicians and former maths teachers. 

Self-paced learning: Photomath’s instant support is like having a 24/7 virtual tutor. Checking your homework before dinner? Stuck on a problem at 2am? We can help. Follow our detailed steps, taking whatever time you need to review definitions, rationale, and more – all within the explanation.

Want to dive deeper and explore more ways to learn? Photomath Plus can get you there with custom Animated Tutorials, detailed Textbook Solutions, and more! 

KEY FEATURES
• Step-by-step explanations included in our basic version (free of charge)
• Word problem instructions
• Interactive graphs
• Video learning
• Multiple solution methods
• Advanced scientific calculator

Photomath is for learners of all levels, including those studying:
Numbers & Quantity
Algebra
Functions
Trigonometry & Angles
Sequences
Geometry
Calculus

“The step-by-step guide is beneficial to students that do not have access to a tutor and struggle with solving math problems.” — Forbes

“A viral video about a new app looks like a dream come true for anyone who struggles with math.” — Time

Ready to immerse yourself in a groundbreaking English, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, French, Portuguese, Portuguese (Brazilian), Italian and German learning experience?

Dive into Praktika and meet your ultra-realistic AI Avatars — your personal language companions for mastering real-world conversation.

Praktika’s avatars aren’t just digital characters — they’re designed with full backstories, cultural depth, and natural accents (American, British, Latin American, and more) to simulate truly human-like interaction. Every session with your avatar feels like speaking with a real person who listens, guides, and helps you grow.

What Makes Praktika Different?
Unlike other language apps that rely on memorization and repetition, Praktika makes language acquisition feel natural. You don’t just study — you engage in conversation. You listen, speak, and respond like you would in real life. Our avatars give you space to practice without fear of judgment or awkward exchanges.

We’ve also added Multimodality, a next-gen learning tool that lets you upload and interact with real content. Share photos, audio, videos, or documents to spark conversations or receive corrections. Use an image of your surroundings to practice vocabulary, or upload your resume to get instant pronunciation coaching on job interviews. It’s the closest thing to having a real tutor with you 24/7.

Simple Pricing
Praktika is free to download, and getting started is easy. Unlock powerful speaking tools, advanced feedback, and avatar-led lessons — all for less than the cost of a single tutoring session.

What You’ll Get:
AI Avatars – Learn through human-like conversations with avatars that adapt to your tone, pace, and goals.
Courses for All Levels – 1000+ lessons including academic prep (IELTS, TOEFL), lifestyle, travel, career paths, and slang.
Practical Conversation Topics – Role-play as a sports commentator, startup founder, or tourist.
Multimodal Learning – Upload photos, PDFs, and voice notes for personalized lessons.
Fluency Tracking – See real progress with speaking metrics, streaks, and in-app challenges.
Localized Avatars – Select coaches from different regions to match your cultural or accent goals.

Meet a Few of Our Avatars
Alisha – Friendly U.S. English tutor, Stanford grad, inclusive and motivating.
Alejandro – Spanish-English tutor from Barcelona, sporty and approachable.
Marco – American news editor, great for professional tone and interview prep.
Charlie – British culture lover, witty and sharp.
Valentina – Mexican Spanish tutor, loves music, dance, and warm conversations.
Lucía – Soft-spoken Spain-based tutor, perfect for literary and academic tone.

Sample Topics
IELTS & TOEFL • Architecture • Art • Business • Car Brands • Cinema • Cuisine • Economic Growth • Education • Environmental Issues • Festivals • Film • Food • Football • Geography • Health • History • Immigration • Influencers • Literature • Music • Natural Wonders • Pop Culture • Relationships • Startups • Science • Shopping • Street Art • Technology • TV Shows • Tourism • UFC • Wildlife... and many more added monthly.

Languages Available
English
Korean
Japanese
Spanish
French
Portuguese
Portuguese (Brazilian)
Italian
German

Why Learners Love Praktika
Realistic AI avatars for immersive practice
Personalized pronunciation and fluency feedback
Multimodal learning with photo, video, and audio uploads
Courses for all levels and goals
Real progress tracking and fluency insights

Praktika is on a mission to break language barriers for the next billion learners. With the power of AI, personalization, and multimodal tools, we believe anyone can develop fluency through real-world conversation. It’s more than just learning — it’s transformation. Download Praktika today and start your journey to confident, fluent communication.

Support: support@praktika.ai
Terms: https://praktika.ai/terms
Privacy: https://praktika.ai/privacy

Aplikacja mobilna Librus na smartfony i tablety przeznaczona jest dla rodziców i uczniów. Umożliwia użytkownikom przeglądanie najważniejszych informacji z rozwiązania LIBRUS Synergia. Nowy, bardziej przejrzysty interfejs oraz widok Oś czasu sprawią, że korzystanie z aplikacji jest szybkie i wygodne.

Z aplikacją Librus, możesz:
• monitorować postępy w nauce dzięki modułowi Oceny,
• sprawdzić nieobecności i spóźnienia,
• mieć stały kontakt ze szkołą dzięki funkcji Wiadomości,
• sprawdzać zadania domowe,
• monitorować najważniejsze wydarzenia i informacje zebrane w jednym widoku Biurko,
• sprawdzać plan lekcji, wprowadzane do niego zmiany oraz zastępstwa, 
• mieć wgląd do aktualnego kalendarza szkolnego oraz ogłoszeń, 
• być na bieżąco dzięki odświeżaniu danych w czasie rzeczywistym,
• wyciszyć powiadomienia aplikacji w godzinach nocnych dzięki funkcji LIBRUS® spokojna noc,
• przełączać się pomiędzy wieloma kontami dzieci bez potrzeby każdorazowego logowania się na kolejne konta – funkcja Multikonto,
• przeglądać dane bez dostępu do Internetu (praca w trybie offline),
• personalizować wygląd i działanie aplikacji – tak jak lubisz,
• konfigurować Natychmiastowe powiadomienia.

description:
The official app for students and staff of Universities using USOS. It can be used to access the services (modules) of USOSweb.

After installing the app, select your University and log in with the same credentials that you use to access USOSweb.

Mobile USOS helps you to do the following from anywhere:
• check your timetable
• send messages via USOSmail
• check your grades and test results or write students' grades and test results
• fill the University surveys
• apply for mLegitymacja for mObywatel app
• check your University payments status
• check your student, staff, or academic IDs and share them as a QR or barcode
• scan and access resources from University QR codes
• check your University calendar for days off
• … and more.

Your University decides which services are available in the app. The app is available only for some of the Univesities that use USOS.
Mobile USOS is distributed by the University Centre for Informatization MUCI. It is developed and maintained by the USOS Workgroup.

Naukado is a comprehensive educational platform that revolutionizes the way of learning various subjects and languages.
With advanced tools, intelligent algorithms, and engaging learning methods, Naukado supports educational development for users of all ages.

KEY FEATURES:
• Intelligent AI chat – get instant answers to questions from different fields of knowledge
• Advanced Polish language tool – generate book analyses, overviews of literary periods, and complete essays
• Math tool – solve problems with step-by-step explanations and interactive formulas
• Conversational English – practice pronunciation, dialogues, and practical grammar for everyday situations
• AI Generator – comprehensive essay creation tailored to Polish school standards
• Interactive quizzes and tests – check your knowledge across various subjects with instant feedback
• Educational flashcards – an effective way to learn vocabulary, definitions, and facts from different subjects
• Widgets and shortcuts – quick access to your most-used features
• Data synchronization – access your materials across different devices

FOR WHOM:
• Students seeking effective study tools
• Language learners
• Teachers and educators looking for innovative teaching methods
• Professionals aiming to develop their skills
• Anyone who values lifelong learning and continuous growth

Naukado combines cutting-edge technology with proven teaching methods, creating a friendly and effective educational environment.
Start your journey with Naukado today and discover how effective and enjoyable modern learning can be!

Play engaging quiz-based games (kahoots) at school, at home and at work, create your own kahoots and learn something new! Kahoot! brings the magic of learning for students, teachers, office superheroes, trivia fans and lifelong learners.
 
Here’s what you can do with the Kahoot! app, now available in English, Spanish (LATAM), French, German, Italian, Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese, Dutch, Turkish, Polish, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish, Ukrainian and Korean:
 
Students
- Study with unlimited free flashcards and other smart study modes
- Join kahoots hosted live - in class or virtually - and use the app to submit answers
- Complete self-paced kahoots
- Study at home or on the go with flashcards and other study modes
- Compete with friends in study groups
- Challenge your friends with kahoots you found or created
- Create your own kahoots and add images or videos
- Host kahoots live for family and friends directly from your mobile device
 
 
Families and friends
- Find a kahoot on any topic, fit for any age
- Host a kahoot live by sharing your screen to Apple TV or via video conferencing apps
- Play a live kahoot using SharePlay. Start a FaceTime call and select the kahoot you want to play. No host is required - everyone can participate!
- Engage your kids with studying at home
- Assign a kahoot to challenge family members and friends
- Create your own kahoots and add different question types and image effects
 
Teachers
- Search among millions of ready-to-play kahoots on any topic
- Create or edit your own kahoots in minutes
- Combine different question types to increase engagement
- Host kahoots live in class or virtually for distance learning
- Assign student-paced kahoots for content review
- Assess learning outcomes with reports
 
Company employees
- Create kahoots for e-learning, presentations, events and other occasions
- Encourage audience participation with polls and word cloud questions
- Host Kahoot! live in person or in a virtual meeting
- Assign self-paced kahoots, for example, for e-learning
- Assess progress and results with reports
 
Premium features:
Kahoot! is free for teachers and their students, and it’s our commitment to keep it that way as part of our mission to make learning awesome. We offer optional upgrades that unlock advanced features, such as an image library with millions of images and advanced question types, such as puzzles, polls, open-ended questions and slides. To take advantage of these features, users will need a paid subscription.
 
To create and host kahoots in a work context, as well as get access to additional features, business users will need a paid subscription.
 
Recurring billing, cancel anytime
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

BzZzZz! Join our hive and start communicating smoothly in a foreign language. It has never been easier to learn English and Spanish!

BeeSpeaker is a true revolution and the first-ever app totally devoted to learning to actually SPEAK English and Spanish. The app gets you speaking from day 1. Within the first week, our users say up to 1000 words in the language they’re learning.

How? It’s a voice-controlled and AI-powered app, based on modern machine learning technology, in which your task is to listen to words and phrases and repeat or answer questions, speaking out loud in a foreign language. BeeSpeaker recognizes what you’re saying and gives you instant feedback. This way, you know where you’re making mistakes and where you need to improve.

Why BeeSpeaker?
- 3000+ English and Spanish video lessons with our teachers and native speakers designed to improve your speaking skills.
- All language lessons are tailored to your level - starting from A0 and ending at C1.
- A powerful AI Tutor module that corrects your mistakes and lets you practice free conversations, any time, any place.
- Focus on vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation, and listening skills.
- Real-time feedback shows you where you’re making mistakes.
- Progress tracking, points and streaks help you stay motivated and keep the learning part FUN!

Are you tired of English vocabulary apps? Are you feeling stuck when actually trying to communicate in English?

We focus on a natural method of learning a language. Instead of memorizing words, grammar rules, or reading flashcards, you learn by listening and repeating in English or Spanish and by practicing real-life conversations. Our interactive lessons help you listen, repeat, and correct mistakes instantly, building confidence every time you speak. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, we’ve got lessons tailored for all levels!

How different people use BeeSpeaker?
- Absolute beginners learn English or Spanish from scratch, with our video lessons tailored to A0 and A1 levels
- Intermediate learners build vocabulary and progress to upper levels through our video course and by practicing speaking with BeeSpeaker’s AI Teacher
- Advanced learners practice pronunciation and speaking with AI Tutor to prepare for popular English exams, like FCE, TOEFL, IELTS, or TOEIC
- And for the most advanced learners, we’ve just added a C1 English course so that you can master your English to perfection

Our instructors
- Experienced teachers and native speakers from countries like Great Britain, the United States, and Australia.
- Thanks to them you will learn different accents and ways of pronouncing particular words.

AI Tutor
- BeeSpeaker’s AI Tutor is your personal English & Spanish language coach powered by artificial intelligence, available 24/7.
- It lets you practice free conversations and adjusts responses to what you’re saying - just like in real life. But without judgement or stress.

The app offers a free 7-day trial during which you can test every feature inside. You can cancel your trial anytime. And when you’re ready, you can unlock all features with our PRO subscription.

Break free from speaking anxiety, gain confidence, and speak English and Spanish naturally! The more you practice with BeeSpeaker, the faster you'll improve. Ready to start speaking fluently? Let BeeSpeaker be your guide.

Download now and join the language revolution!

Terms of use: https://beespeaker.com/terms/
Privacy policy: https://beespeaker.com/privacy-policy/

Busuu helps you communicate with confidence from day one. Combine expertly designed language lessons with feedback and tips from our global community of native speakers and harness the power of learning together.

What is the best way to learn languages (such as English, German, Spanish and or Chinese)? The most efficient and proven method is with flashcards. By using Fiszkoteka flashcards you can quickly build up your vocabulary and language skills. They by far outperform traditional language courses that are often dull and lead to disappointing results.

We have created this app because we want to share an awesome product that we are certain will help you achieve many if not all of your language ambitions. Everyone using our app will be able to find value in our products. No matter if you are a language aficionado, preparing for a proficiency exam or practicing for an upcoming trip abroad. We have prepared everything to aid your language learning quest! 

It is intimidating and overwhelming to think about conquering a whole new language, but that is where we come in to give you a hand. Our app is user friendly and has been tailored for all language learners, regardless if you are a beginner, advanced learner, or somewhere in between. 

If you are thinking about taking a language proficiency exam, our flashcards will help you feel confident and ready to tackle popular exams such as DELF, DAAD, DELE and the CPE. Fortunately, grammar in general is quite simple. Knowing the basics is sufficient enough and it is not worth spending more of your time learning it, as all of this will come naturally.

With our app you can learn numerous languages online with multiple courses created by professionals. In addition, there are a plethora of language lessons created by other users, many of whom are native speakers.

Our app is a free product which can be downloaded and used right away. You have the options to sample all of our courses and languages that we have to offer. You can even create your own flashcards for free! 

The flashcards have been compiled into many forms, such as pronunciation in MP3 format, images, examples of relevant phrases used in natural contexts, as well as some basic grammar information.

Learning languages has never been easier and more exciting! 

Our other features include using our app as a translator. Just type a word in your native language or language you are learning. Apart from the translation, you will be able to add this (with the pronunciation and exemplar usage) to your own flashcards.

In this way, you cannot only check meanings of words but also learn and memorize them forever (as if it were there all along). Our methods will remarkably broaden your vocabulary and in the future you will no longer need to bother with any form of dictionary! 

Our app also helps you achieve a systematic approach to learning. Motivation and discipline is key to learning any language successfully and we are here to help you stay on track. We are passionate about languages and it may seem that we harp on the study and learning aspect a bit too much, but this app is also meant to be entertainmenting and of course fun. We have especially designed our app to make it feel as if you are not learning, even though you actually are. 


One great and easy habit to get into is setting reminders for yourself, which you can set as a widget for studying languages after unlocking your mobile screen.

We are leaps ahead of our competition because our methods actually churn out positive results. What separates us from the competition is that we have figured out a systematic learning approach that learners will appreciate and use as their main method to continue learning. We created an app that actively engages the language learner rather than having them passively translate sentences or try to understand obscure and impractical sentences. Words and phrases will not only be familiar or ring a bell, but they will stay locked in your memory for good. 

With Fiszkoteka, you now have the power of language at your disposal to wield and create sentences with an impressive level of fluency.

Nauka języka w zasięgu ręki! Poznaj eTutora - najlepszą polską aplikację do nauki języków obcych i dołącz do 2 milionów zadowolonych Użytkowników!

Z apką możesz uczyć się 5 języków: angielskiego, hiszpańskiego, włoskiego, niemieckiego i francuskiego, gdziekolwiek jesteś. Odkryj nowy wymiar nauki języka i otwórz się na dalekie podróże, rozwój pasji czy nową pracę! 

DLACZEGO ETUTOR?

• Z naszą aplikacją zyskujesz językową pewność siebie!
Przerabiając krótkie lekcje stworzone przez językowych ekspertów, ćwiczysz każdą umiejętność. Poczujesz swobodę w czytaniu, słuchaniu, pisaniu i mówieniu. A z funkcją Trenera wymowy wspieraną przez AI zadbasz o perfekcyjny akcent.

• Nasze kursy językowe dostosowują się do Ciebie. 
Z eTutorem ustalasz własny plan nauki - uczysz się, kiedy chcesz i w takim tempie, jakie lubisz. A poziom zaawansowania zmieniasz samodzielnie w dowolnym momencie! 

• Znamy przepis na skuteczne zapamiętywanie i korzystamy z mocy AI! 
Stworzyliśmy system powtórek oparty o sztuczną inteligencję. Wychwytuje trudne dla Ciebie słowa i pomaga je lepiej zapamiętać.

• eTutor & Diki: nasz superduet do nauki języków obcych Cię zachwyci!
Korzystasz z popularnego słownika online, nie przerywając pracy z kursem. Sprawdzasz nowe słowa - nie tylko angielskie - dodajesz je do swoich powtórek i słuchasz nagrań. To wszystko w jednej apce!


Chcesz podgrzać motywację?
Zbierasz monety, zdobywasz nowe osiągnięcia, bijesz własne rekordy i rywalizujesz z innymi Użytkownikami w grach i quizach językowych. A my systematycznie wysyłamy Ci przypominajki motywujące do regularnej nauki angielskiego czy innego języka.

Szukasz prawdziwego języka?
Słuchasz nagrań z udziałem native speakerów i sięgasz po lekcje specjalne poruszające tematy “na topie”. Udostępniamy je aż w 5 językach: angielskim, niemieckim, hiszpańskim, włoskim i francuskim.

Masz duszę odkrywcy?
Zaglądasz do notatek kulinarnych, muzycznych i gramatycznych w kursie lub na blog, gdzie czekają wpisy pełne językowych tipów oraz sposobów na efektywną naukę.


CO MÓWIĄ O NAS UŻYTKOWNICY?
• "Uwielbiam tę apkę. Polecam ją każdemu, kto chce samodzielnie pracować nad nauką języka. Prosty interface, wymowa i dobry słownik w tle!” - Oliwia Grafka

• “Platforma eTutor oferuje ogromną ilość narzędzi do nauki języka, gier językowych, ćwiczeń czy też forum Społeczność, ale najważniejszą według mnie funkcjonalnością, z której korzystam praktycznie na co dzień jest powiązanie ze słownikiem Diki i możliwość dodania nowo znalezionych słów i wyrażeń do powtórek.” - Rafał Dercz

• “Super aplikacja. Już po przerobieniu poziomu A2 można przełamać barierę językową. Szkoda czasu na darmowe aplikacje. Jak się kupi w promocji wychodzi 15 zł/miesiąc. Nie zamieniłbym na żadną inną.” - Andrzej D.


CHCESZ UPEWNIĆ SIĘ, ŻE ETUTOR JEST DLA CIEBIE?
Zarejestruj się i testuj aplikację przez 3 dni za darmo!

W ramach bezpłatnego okresu próbnego możesz przetestować kursy językowe bez żadnych zobowiązań. To idealna okazja, aby przekonać się, jak łatwa i przyjemna jest nauka języków z eTutorem.

• Czujesz, że nadajemy na tych samych falach? Pełnię możliwości aplikacji odblokujesz, wybierając abonament (3-miesięczny, roczny lub dwuletni) na jeden z naszych kursów: angielski, hiszpański, niemiecki, francuski. W przypadku kursu języka włoskiego możesz skorzystać z subskrypcji - już od 39 zł/miesiąc!

• Wolisz pozostać przy darmowej wersji eTutora? Regularnie będziemy dostarczać Ci nowe treści: quizy językowe, wpisy blogowe czy lekcje specjalne, ale pozostałe funkcje aplikacji - m.in. dostęp do lekcji w kursie, system powtórek, integracja ze słownikiem Diki - będą ograniczone.

Dołącz do eTutora i poczuj radość z nauki języków obcych już dziś! Efekty Cię zaskoczą!


MASZ PYTANIA? Napisz na pomoc@etutor.pl. Chętnie pomożemy!

Korzystaj z eTutora w przeglądarce: https://www.etutor.pl/

Polityka prywatności: https://www.etutor.pl/regulamin/polityka-prywatnosci/

developer: Makalu Media Sp. z o. o. Spolka komandytowa
description:
Odrabiamy – niezbędnik każdego ucznia w tym roku szkolnym!

Odrabiamy to kompleksowe narzędzie edukacyjne stworzone z myślą o uczniach szkół podstawowych i ponadpodstawowych. W jednym miejscu znajdziesz rozwiązania zadań z tysięcy podręczników, darmowe notatki z ponad dziesięciu przedmiotów, gotowe sprawdziany oraz plannery przygotowujące do egzaminu ósmoklasisty i matury. Dzięki edukacyjnemu asystentowi AI, dopasowanemu do Twojej klasy i obowiązującej podstawy programowej, nawet wymagające zadania z matematyki przestają być problemem – asystent tłumaczy je krok po kroku, aż wszystko staje się zrozumiałe.

Odrabiamy to także kursy obejmujące całą podstawę programową w przejrzystej i przystępnej formie, które ułatwiają systematyczną naukę i powtórki. Aby nauka była jeszcze prostsza, Odrabiamy pozwala też błyskawicznie wyszukiwać treści – wystarczy zeskanować kod kreskowy podręcznika, by zyskać dostęp do materiałów przygotowanych przez zespół ponad siedemdziesięciu nauczycieli.

Aplikacja działa w domu, w szkole i w drodze, zapewniając uczniom stałe wsparcie w nauce. Jest dostępna zarówno w wersji darmowej, jak i premium, tak aby każdy mógł korzystać z niej w najbardziej wygodny sposób.

Pobierz Odrabiamy i ucz się szybciej, łatwiej i bez stresu – wszystko, czego potrzebujesz do sukcesu na sprawdzianach i egzaminach, masz zawsze pod ręką!

Over 75 million people learn a language with Memrise because it goes beyond teaching you a language—it brings you the experience of real-life conversations, cultural insights, and the confidence to speak like a local.

Learn Spanish, Korean, Japanese or 34 other languages in lessons that teach you vocabulary, listening and speaking as if you were a local living in the country!

Choose a language from Spanish (MEX & EU), Korean, Japanese, English, French, Italian, Portuguese (PT & BR), German, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Arabic, Chinese, Dutch, Danish, Icelandic, Mongolian, Norwegian, Slovenian, Yoruba, Hindi, Ukrainian, Thai, Swahili, Hebrew, Greek, Indonesian, Welsh, Tagalog, Persian, Vietnamese.

* Showing you how to piece together natural sentences, preparing you for everyday conversation
* Giving you a place to practice role-play and gain confidence

Memrise is the best language-learning app for beginners that are starting to learn a language from scratch, intermediate learners that want to build on their listening and speaking, and advanced learners who are looking to improve their conversational skills.

Download Memrise so that you can confidently:

* Connect with your partner and their family
* Have a better time while travelling
* Sharpen your mind if you’re learning a language for brain health
* Prepare for a language exam
* Connect with work colleagues
* Better understand different cultures

How do we help you have conversations in other languages?

* Choose from hundreds of real-life scenarios
* Build vocab by learning relevant words & phrases the locals actually use
* Practice listening to native speaker videos using what you’ve just learned
* Then build confidence speaking with AI Buddies, your personalised language learning bots

- Helping 75+ million learners speak confidently
- 190,000 4.6 star ratings
- Featured in BBC World Service, Forbes, The Verge, The Financial Times, and more

What other learners are saying

I find the Learn with Locals feature to be especially useful, more so as my Portuguese improves. My wife and I spent a couple of weeks in Portugal a few months ago, and we were able to handle all of our transactions - stores, restaurants, markets, car rental, etc!" - Voloúre

Need to speak a new language soon? Get the practice you need with Memrise Pro

- Unlock all vocab lessons
- Unlock all native speaker videos
- Unlimited speaking practice
- Ad free

Compare with our Free Plan
- Limited vocab lessons
- Limited videos and conversations
- Ads

Download our app for free and start learning with Memrise today: Learn French, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Mexico), German, Korean, Japanese, Japanese (no script), Turkish, Italian, Chinese (simplified), Dutch, Portuguese (Portugal), Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Swedish, Norwegian, Polish, Danish, Slovenian, Icelandic, Yoruba, Mongolian, English (UK) and English (US)!

Subscriptions can be managed or cancelled in your Apple App Store account. In-app Permissions – To enable some of the features of the Memrise app we may need to ask for your permission. For example, we'll ask to access your microphone if you'd like to practice your pronunciation skills. You can change permissions at any time in your settings.
